div.div: Provide a nurturing environment in which students realize their full intellectual potential and become self-directed learners...
Empowering children to demonstrate their unique interests and abilities.

h2.class: uk-heading-small uk-heading-divider uk-text-primary uk-margin-small uk-width-xxlarge uk-margin-auto uk-text-center

div.p: Teaneck Community Charter School, located in Teaneck - New Jersey, is a K-8 public charter school. We guide our students to become self-directed learners and community contributors in a respectful and caring learning environment.

div.class: wk-grid-width-1-1 wk-grid-width-small-1-2 wk-grid-width-medium-1-3 wk-grid-width-large-1-4 wk-grid-width-xlarge-1-4 wk-grid wk-grid-match wk-grid-collapse

div.p: It is the mission of (TCCS) Teaneck Community Charter School to provide a nurturing environment in which students realize their full…
Our project-based curriculum for students in Grades K-8 based on the NJSLS…
Find out what’s happening at TCCS!
Check out the upcoming events sponsored by our parent/community organization!
TCCS offers a Before and After School Program open to all students in Grades K-8!
Our Athletics Program consists of soccer, basketball, softball, and baseball…
Our enriching musical theater program immerses students into every aspect of the performing arts…
Interested in one of our hands-on clubs or summer camps?
Please check out the following video for a special Thankful Thursday message from your TCCS faculty and administration!

h3.a: TCCS Virtual Spirit Week – March 30 – April 3, 2020

div.p: TCCS will have a Virtual Spirit Week starting March 30, 2020. Check out the below video and document from Ms. Torres for more details!

p.a: Virtual Spirit Week Video from Ms Torres – March 2020

div.p: Due to the current public health emergency, TCCS will be CLOSED until further notice. Please click the links below to read important messages from Mr. Gallo.

p.a: TCCS Update and Video Conferencing Info – 3-31-2020

div.p: It was a very busy summer at TCCS, as many aspects of our ambitious construction projects wrapped up!

In collaboration with Friends of Teaneck Community Charter School, TCCS is proud to unveil a completely reconfigured and renovated Kindergarten Suite. The Suite boasts three spacious, state-of-the-art classrooms outfitted with custom cabinetry and cubbies for the students. This year, TCCS begins it long-planned enrollment expansion by expanding Kindergarten to 45 pupils. The design of the Suite creates an inviting learning environment for our students. Class size has been reduced to 15 students per instructor, providing greater interaction and engagement. The Kindergarten Suite also features a small Pantry/Kitchen and upgraded bathrooms. With an eye toward next year, when our rising K’s join the ranks of the 1-2 students, an additional classroom has been created by converting a storage room into a new, spacious first/second grade classroom overlooking the playground!
Meanwhile, the Gymnasium and Creative Arts Suite project hums along and is entering the final stretch!

We are proud to announce that the Visual Arts classroom (Ms. Abbie’s room) was open for business for the 1st day of school! We appreciate LaRocca Construction’s efforts and collaboration to make this happen.
Now that the Art Room is in its new home, the Science Classrooms have been able to shift around so that both 5/6 and 7/8 science rooms have running water and ample space for labs.
The Performing Arts Suite, the Digital Media Studio, and the new Copy Center for instructors will be opening in the next couple of weeks!
The GYM! We’re almost there! The sports equipment (backstops) is being installed soon. Then the wood floor gets laid, sanded, painted, and sealed. Completion is within reach!
Stay tuned for more construction updates!

563 Chestnut Avenue
Teaneck, New Jersey 07666

Harassment, Intimidation, and Bullying of any kind is not tolerated at TCCS. You can read more about this in the school's official policy on this matter. You can click below to view the the official school HIB Grade Report.
